languages.text: {n}Глаза офицера пораженно расширяются.{/n} "Ваша... Я... Я не смел просить о подобном, Ваша Светлость. Поверьте, мы оправдаем ожидания. Те, кто умрет сегодня, умрут с улыбкой, ибо для нас это — великий день!"
languages.translation_comment:
Инфернус
Старт Crypt_InfernusHelp. Инфернусы будут с дробовиками

Инфернус
Старт Crypt_InfernusHelp. Инфернусы будут с дробовиками

languages.text: {n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза офицера пораженно расширяются.{/n} "Ваша... Я... Я не смел просить о подобном, Ваша Светлость. Поверьте, мы оправдаем ожидания. Те, кто умрет сегодня, умрут с улыбкой, ибо для нас это — великий день!"

traits.locale_text: {n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"

{n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"

{n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"

{n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"

languages.text: {n}Il écarquille les yeux de stupéfaction.{/n} « Votre... Je... Jamais je n'aurais osé vous en faire la demande, Votre Seigneurie. Nous nous montrerons à la hauteur de vos attentes, je vous en fais le serment. Ceux qui mourront aujourd'hui partiront avec le sourire aux lèvres, car c'est un grand jour pour notre peuple ! »
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il écarquille les yeux de stupéfaction.{/n} « Votre... Je... Jamais je n'aurais osé vous en faire la demande, Votre Seigneurie. Nous nous montrerons à la hauteur de vos attentes, je vous en fais le serment. Ceux qui mourront aujourd'hui partiront avec le sourire aux lèvres, car c'est un grand jour pour notre peuple ! »

languages.text: {n}Sus ojos se abren como platos.{/n} «Mi... No... Nunca me habría atrevido a pedirle algo así, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Estaremos a la altura de sus expectativas, lo juro. Los que mueran hoy lo harán sonriendo, ¡pues hoy es un día glorioso para los nuestros!».
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus ojos se abren como platos.{/n} «Mi... No... Nunca me habría atrevido a pedirle algo así, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Estaremos a la altura de sus expectativas, lo juro. Los que mueran hoy lo harán sonriendo, ¡pues hoy es un día glorioso para los nuestros!».

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇震惊地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“您……我……我做梦也不敢想象这样的恩典，大人。我向您发誓，我们绝对不会辜负您的期望。今天战死的人都会面带微笑迎接死亡，因为对我们的人来说，今天是个大日子！”
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇震惊地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“您……我……我做梦也不敢想象这样的恩典，大人。我向您发誓，我们绝对不会辜负您的期望。今天战死的人都会面带微笑迎接死亡，因为对我们的人来说，今天是个大日子！”

languages.text: {n}彼は驚いて目を見開いた。{/n}「あなたは…聞く勇気はありませんでした、陛下。ですが、ご期待に沿えるように努力します。約束します。今日死ぬ者達は、笑顔で死ぬでしょう。なぜなら、今日は私達にとって素晴らしい日だからです！」
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は驚いて目を見開いた。{/n}「あなたは…聞く勇気はありませんでした、陛下。ですが、ご期待に沿えるように努力します。約束します。今日死ぬ者達は、笑顔で死ぬでしょう。なぜなら、今日は私達にとって素晴らしい日だからです！」

languages.text: {n}Seine Augen weiten sich überrascht.{/n} "Euer ... Ich ... Ich hätte es nie gewagt, darum zu bitten, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir werden Eure Erwartungen erfüllen, das schwöre ich. Wer heute stirbt, der stirbt lächelnd, denn heute ist ein großartiger Tag für uns!"
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Seine Augen weiten sich überrascht.{/n} "Euer ... Ich ... Ich hätte es nie gewagt, darum zu bitten, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir werden Eure Erwartungen erfüllen, das schwöre ich. Wer heute stirbt, der stirbt lächelnd, denn heute ist ein großartiger Tag für uns!"

languages.text: {n}Gözleri hayretle açılıyor.{/n} "L... Ben... Ben böyle bir şey isteme cüreti asla gösteremezdim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Beklentilerinizi boşa çıkarmayacağız. Yemin ederim. Bugün topluluğumuz için kutlu bir gündür. Bugün ölenler, yüzlerinde bir gülümsemeyle ölecek!"
languages.original_text: {n}His eyes widen in astonishment.{/n} "Your... I... I never would have dared to ask, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will live up to your expectations, I swear it. Those who die today will die smiling, for today is a great day for our people!"
